titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Sonic revolution [videorecording] : a celebration of the MC5 / Levi's Vintage Clothing celebrates Fraction Films in association with Slice, Muscle Tone Records and Blue Lagoon Media ; producer, Marek Budrynkai.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Sonic revolution [videorecording] : a celebration of the MC5 / Levi's Vintage Clothing celebrates Fraction Films in association with Slice, Muscle Tone Records and Blue Lagoon Media ; producer, Marek Budrynkai.

odd.head: Date/Time and Place of Event
odd.p: Recorded, live at London's 100 Club in March 2003.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Chatsworth, CA : Distributed by Image Entertainment, [2004]

odd.head: Creation/Production Credits
odd.p: Camera, James Cronin ... [et al.] ; editor, Marek Budrynkai.

odd.head: Participant or Performer
odd.p: Wayne Kramer, Michael Davis, Dennis Thompson.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Skunk (Sonicly speaking) -- Gotta keep movin' -- Shakin' street -- Tonight -- Looking at you -- High school -- Poison -- The American ruse -- Rocket reducer No. 62 (Rama lama fa-fa-fa) -- Sister Anne -- Ramblin' Rose -- Kick out the jams (promotional film by John and Leni Sinclair)

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Special features: the documentary; behind-the-scenes; the bonus archives.

archdesc.scopecontent: In March 2003 the surviving members of counterculture band MC5 reunite for a concert. Includes concert footage and a documentary about the band.

subject.term: MC 5 live : kick out the jams.
